Special comments¶

  • default_exp. name of the python model which is going to be created In our case, our python module is called hello nbdev

  • #export

Functions¶

We can call this function

say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to somebody

class helloSayer[source]

helloSayer(to)

Say hello to to using say_hello

helloSayer.say[source]

helloSayer.say()

Do the saying

o = helloSayer("Alexis")
o.say()

'Hello to Alexis!'

helloname[source]

helloname(fname:"A notebook name or globe to convert"=None)

We have to install the script to work.
